tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I underwent knees surgery .Dr Sharan Shivaraj Patil did the suregery successfully. After 6 weeks of surgery I am walking independently without walker and support of any body. The doctor has explained and instructed about the follow up activities after the surgery . Also the Doctor is courteous with the patients. Even physiotherapists also shown lot of concern and treated me well. Specifically the dedication of Sri Sanjay Poul physiotherapist in the hospital and in home service is highly appreciated. I thank Dr.Sharan Shivaraj Patil and his entire team for their wellbeing in treating me to my satisfaction.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The surgical team did a splendid job with my 90 year old mother‚Äôs hip joint fracture. And the nursing staff at Sparsh Infantry road was super. Always ready to ensure mom was comfortable and taken care. Hats off to the nursing team !!

It will be really good if the surgery team would communicate a little more with the patient & the family before and after the surgery. It will give a lot of comfort to the family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
The first day I waited over two hours only to see him for less than one minute when he says "please get an MRI". The second day I waited almost an hour and saw him for 5 minutes. In between I need to contact him about the MRI but the phone number I was given only connected to the exchange and nobody answered. I left a message asking for a call back at the OPD department and of course nobody called me. 
I did speak to a couple of junior doctors who were very good, attentive and respectful of my time. Dr Patil came highly recommended and I was very disappointed. His recommendation was that I "do physiotherapy sincerely" by which I can only assume he thinks I have not being doing physio for over 6 months, despite not asking me or knowing me at all. Could have spent my time so much better. Between the long lines at payment and fighting through Bangalore traffic and waiting for the doctor, I really would have been better off not seeing him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a broken leg and i am expecting a surgery for internal fixation. My wife booked an appointment to see Dr. Sharan Patil at 1.40 PM so that she can consult and get his opinion.Firstly Doctor didn't show up for about an hour saying he was on rounds and later went for lunch. The OPD staff was calling us 20 min prior to the appointment asking if we are coming for the appointment and when we showed up before time the Dr is not there for an hour.Secondly his assistants came and took all the reports from wife saying that the nurse will give it back to her.Dr. Sharan came after an hour's wait and didn't even spend 5 min to speak with my wife saying there is no need for surgery and it will heal on its own. My wife was literally walking and talking to Dr he didn't even have time to sit and talk to my wife patiently. When my wife insisted him to provide proper guideline he just denied saying i don't treat reports i treat patients. Without even considering that a person with Broken leg can't visit every doctor for an opinion.Last but not the least and biggest bummer is when the nurse returned all the reports to my wife they had lost one of my prescriptions. Now they are not able to find it and without that i can't claim my bills with insurance company.I would say there is no empathy towards patients and very bad management.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
**** ***** *** ******** ******** *** ******* ******* **** *** * also it takes 4 to 5 hrs to complete consultation.
Staffs those who are coordinating won‚Äôt respond properly.Main thing Dr Sharan Patil doesn‚Äôt have time to talk to the patient. Reply‚Äôs are give by junior trainee doctor. ***** ***** **** ***************** ** ******* ***** ***** ** **** *** ***** ******** **** **** **** ***** ** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was having severe pain in my knees. I had lot of apprehensions regarding surgery.  Dr.Sharan Patil cleared all my doubts. He was very friendly,  highly positive and assured complete recovery.  Meeting him built confidence and courage in me.  
Surgery was done successfully and now I am back to normal  walking independently .  My gratitude and regards to Dr. Sharan Patil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sharan Patil comes across as someone who is very approachable  and his excellent  bedside manner instills immense confidence in the patient, 
thereby contributing to  a sure and speedy recovery 
I wish him nothing but the very best in all his future endeavors 
Indira Basapa

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Before surgery Dr.Sharan Patil assured me  that I can walk comfortably without pain after hip replacement surgery  just after one month.  But  even after  undergoing physiotherapy regularly for seven months  I am not in a position  to walk comfortably. I am limping while walking  and getting pain.  I am really  unhappy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Iwas thaken treatment to my heel pain few years back with same doctor. During that period I was got cured my heal pain in very short time . On the hope of that I have made toget treatment from same doctor.  I am greatful to the doctor with a simple way my knee pain cured.  I am very much thanfull
To the doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr.Sharan had collected the x ray and had explained the osteoarthritis issues well.His explanation brought in confidence to go ahead with operation to my father. The only issue I faced was to have one coordinator to be with us and ensure all the tests were done. Every one were only localised to  their work. Hope my concern will be addressed.

tags: Wait time,
review:
The waiting period was so long, i had an appointment for 11:40am which got rescheduled for 12:20pm. Inwas in the hospital from 1145am to 3:30pm just to show Dr Sharan Patil regarding pain in my knees. Till 1:05pm no junior Dr had even checked me and taken my case history. Only after many complaints was i attended to. 

I came for the expertise of Dr Sharan Patil but had a horrible time waiting for consultation. I was happy with is diagnosis but very unhappy with Sparsh systems. May seriously consider going back again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: We came to meet Dr. Sharan but only his juniors did the diagnosis. Dr. Sharan came at the very end saw the x-ray *** *** and left in a hurry saying the juniors will explain. The whole meet with Dr. Sharan was just for around 20 seconds and this is not an exaggeration. They say just a doctor's words have healing capability. If that is true then in that aspect the doctor failed miserably. We have paid Rs. 800 for consulting the senior doctor,not the juniors. The doctor however senior he might be needs to respect the patient. We waited for 2 hours to see the doctor and for what to see him for just 20seconds?. **** * *** **** ***** **** *** **** **** ***** Not expected of the doctor when we are paying him to see us. Utterly disappointed. Hope this helps some reader.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1.,Very friendly professional Doctors team of Dr Saran Patil
2.Very confident and master in his work of Knee replacement with Robotic surgery only available at this hospital
3.Dr Patil team member Dr Ravi is a very friendly with all patients and sharing all informations about operation.He gives a complete confidence to patient to become mentally positive preparedness of operation.
I have no words with Dr Patil and his entire team.Simply I can say they are superb and unmatched in his profession

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

I took appointment for Sharan Patel but I was assessed by Duty doctors ***** **** *** *** ********** ******* *** I was asked to take X-Ray without doctor assessment and had done it.
I showed the report to duty doctors and then Sharan came and told me that I need to go for MRI neither seeing X-Ray or not explaining patient and refer to Neuro Surgeon for opinion.** **** ** **** ** ******* ***** **** ********.then I took Neuro Surgeon appointment *** *** ****** ******* *** **** *** ***** **** ************ **** ** ** *** ********* *** **** ** ******* *** ****** ********* **** ** ******* **** ** *********** ******** *** ** *********** *** ** ************ ******* ********* *** ******* .so I strongly recommend to other patients not to go this hospital and not to face other patients with same problem and wasted my time and my money without diagnostic.
